name: The System
description:
A narrative Slice of life game exploring some of the day to day struggles of a DID system, made with the Twine engine.

Disclaimer:
The authors of this game do not have personal experience with DID and despite efforts to be true to the condition, there may be inconsistencies. We apologize for any wrongful portrayals and are open to feedback and criticism.

Read More: traumadissociation.com/alters

Dispelling the myths of DID: youtube.com/multiplicity-and-me
